pageSetting.title: 客户存贷款期限结构明细

select.isEqual: select khlx,khh,khmc,hzye,qxmc,khye,qxdh from ( select khlx.dmms khlx,fx.khh,fx.khmc,hz.hzye,qx.qxmc,fx.khye,fx.qxdh, rank() OVER(ORDER BY hz.hzye DESC) AS PM from KHFX_CKQXJGMX_$tjrq$ fx inner join CSB_DMMS khlx on fx.khlx=khlx.dmz and khlx.dmmc='KHLX' inner join (select tjrq,khdxdh,khh,sum(khye) hzye from KHFX_CKQXJGMX_$tjrq$ mx where 1=1 and mx.khdxdh =$khdxdh$ and mx.khlx='$khlx$' and mx.khh = '$khh$' and mx.khmc like '%$khmc$%' group by tjrq, khdxdh, khh ) hz on hz.tjrq=fx.tjrq and hz.khdxdh=fx.khdxdh and hz.khh=fx.khh inner join csb_qxsdb qx on qx.qxdh=fx.qxdh and qx.jxdxlx=$ywlx$ inner join TABLE(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(fx.tjrq,$login_khdxdh$, 0)) QX on qx.khdxdh=fx.khdxdh where 1=1 and fx.khdxdh =$khdxdh$ and fx.khlx='$khlx$' and fx.khh = '$khh$' and fx.khmc like '%$khmc$%' ) a where 1=1 and a.pm <= $pm$

select khlx,khh,khmc,hzye,qxmc,khye,qxdh from ( select khlx.dmms khlx,fx.khh,fx.khmc,hz.hzye,qx.qxmc,fx.khye,fx.qxdh, rank() OVER(ORDER BY hz.hzye DESC) AS PM from KHFX_DKQXJGMX_$tjrq$ fx inner join CSB_DMMS khlx on fx.khlx=khlx.dmz and khlx.dmmc='KHLX' inner join (select tjrq,khdxdh,khh,sum(khye) hzye from KHFX_DKQXJGMX_$tjrq$ mx where 1=1 and mx.khdxdh =$khdxdh$ and mx.khlx='$khlx$' and mx.khh = '$khh$' and mx.khmc like '%$khmc$%' group by tjrq, khdxdh, khh ) hz on hz.tjrq=fx.tjrq and hz.khdxdh=fx.khdxdh and hz.khh=fx.khh inner join csb_qxsdb qx on qx.qxdh=fx.qxdh and qx.jxdxlx=$ywlx$ inner join TABLE(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(fx.tjrq,$login_khdxdh$, 0)) QX on qx.khdxdh=fx.khdxdh where 1=1 and fx.khdxdh =$khdxdh$ and fx.khlx='$khlx$' and fx.khh = '$khh$' and fx.khmc like '%$khmc$%' ) a where 1=1 and a.pm <= $pm$
